Articles.Content:
The Fly Like 1936 Challenge is a challenge that wants you to create a Douglas DC-3 and fly it to the North Pole and set up a base. Here are some basic achievements:

400 points: Bomber - Drop your base from your DC-3 in air!

200 points: Party Bus - Bring some extra kerbals (at least 20 kerbals.)

300 points: Bring Him Home - Return the DC-3 home without refueling!

100 points: Sully - Land it in the water (in one piece!)
You ought to edit it so you cannot use HyperEdit or debug menu cheat bar
Do we need to install a propeller mod, or should we build something that looks like a DC-3 using stock parts?
Hmmm ... Let's hope the TS is still motivated after all this time.
